price: 54. Markuu idinka faydo dhibaatadana, mise qaar idin ka mid ahi ayaa Rabbigood (Alle) la wadaajiya cibaadada cid kale.
arabic: ثُمَّ إِذَا كَشَفَ ٱلضُّرَّ عَنكُمۡ إِذَا فَرِيقٞ مِّنكُم بِرَبِّهِمۡ يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: thumma idhā kashafa al-ḍura ʿankum idhā farīqun minkum birabbihim yush'rikūna
